description: User and instant info of the order which is transcribed as being discontinued to the paper MAR (medication administration record).

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DC_ORD_TRAN_USR_ID
columns.description: User who transcribes the order as being discontinued to the paper MAR (medication administration record).

columns.name: DC_ORD_TRAN_IN_DTTM
columns.description: Instant (date/time) that the order was transcribed as being discontinued to the paper MAR (medication administration record).
